basic.description: This course covers American and European art from Abstract Expressionism to the present. The course also examines the reactions against Abstract Expressionism and investigates late-modernist practices (e.g., Pop Art, Minimalism, Conceptualism, Earth Art, Performance Art). Topics discussed include contemporary artistic practices and the relationship between modernism and postmodernism.
basic.subject: ARH
basic.title: Art after 1940
